titles.title: Nibiki no Neko to Genkina Kazoku
Ni-biki no Neko to Genkina Kazoku
二匹の猫と元気な家族

data.title: Nibiki no Neko to Genkina Kazoku
data.title_japanese: 二匹の猫と元気な家族
title_synonyms: Ni-biki no Neko to Genkina Kazoku
data.synopsis: An educational film following a family that moved to Tokyo after the Kobe earthquake and the passive discrimination they received.

data.title: Boku no Aozora
data.title_japanese: ぼくの青空
data.synopsis: An educational film about child's battle with muscular dystrophy.

data.title: Niji no Kakehashi
data.title_japanese: 虹のかけ橋
data.synopsis: Satoshi is a popular boy thanks to his success in soccer. Kaori becomes jealous and spreads rumors that Satoshi was of low class birth. The school begins to shun Satoshi to the point that he stops playing soccer. When Kaori's house is damaged by a landslide Satoshi comes to help.

titles.title: Souta no Chikai: Sabetsu ni Makenai Chikara
草太の誓い－差別に負けない力－

data.title: Souta no Chikai: Sabetsu ni Makenai Chikara
data.title_japanese: 草太の誓い－差別に負けない力－
data.synopsis: An educational film about how farmers and townspeople during the Edo period were considered low class citizens and constantly at the end of unprovoked discrimination.

data.title: Kumori Nochi Hare
data.title_japanese: くもりのち晴れ
data.synopsis: An educational film about bullying, it follows a girl who is bullied so much that she loses the ability to speak.

titles.title: 負けるな！千太～さよならいじめ虫～

data.title: Makeruna! Senta: Sayonara Ijime Mushi
data.title_japanese: 負けるな！千太～さよならいじめ虫～
data.synopsis: Human beings as well as other creatures have a cruel heart. Everyone thinks that all they're doing is bullying insects. In this anime each individual is confronted with the bullying and asked about it; their replies show the ugliness of their own hearts.

data.title: Mebuki
data.title_japanese: 芽吹き
data.synopsis: An educational film about listening to your inner voice when you see discrimination. Social customs and values should not override cruelty and abuse done upon others.

titles.title: Aru Zombie Shoujo no Sainan PV
The Misfortune of a Certain Zombie Girl
あるゾンビ少女の災難

data.title: Aru Zombie Shoujo no Sainan PV
data.title_japanese: あるゾンビ少女の災難
title_synonyms: The Misfortune of a Certain Zombie Girl
data.synopsis: Promotional video for an anime adaptation of the Aru Zombie Shoujo novel series. Though uploaded in July 2012, the proposed adaptation never came to fruition.

data.title: Kakusensou
data.title_japanese: 核戦争
data.synopsis: An educational film about nuclear warfare and the effects it has on the environment as told by a talking frog.

titles.title: Juuroku Jizou Monogatari: Sensou no Gisei ni Natta Kodomo-tachi
十六地蔵物語 ―戦争の犠牲になった子どもたち―

data.title: Juuroku Jizou Monogatari: Sensou no Gisei ni Natta Kodomo-tachi
data.title_japanese: 十六地蔵物語 ―戦争の犠牲になった子どもたち―
data.synopsis: 1 day before the end of WWII for Japan in September 1944 Sadamitsu, Tokushima was under one final air raid. Elementary school boys proceeded to carry out their evacuation policy and many became victims.

data.title: Neko wa Ikite Iru
data.title_japanese: 猫は生きている
data.synopsis: On the night of March 10, 1945 the US Military sends out B-29s for another air raid. Masao's mother is frantically trying to evacuate and so is their cat Inazuma who had kittens.

titles.title: DD Hokuto no Ken 2 Ichigo Aji+
DD北斗の拳2 イチゴ味+
DD Fist of the North Star 2: Strawberry Flavor Plus
DD Fist of the North Star: Strawberry Flavor
DD First of The North Star Ⅱ: Strawberry Flavor

data.title: DD Hokuto no Ken 2 Ichigo Aji+
data.title_english: DD Fist of the North Star 2: Strawberry Flavor Plus
data.title_japanese: DD北斗の拳2 イチゴ味+
data.synopsis:
In the 21st century, the characters of Fist of the North Star are living in peaceful Japan. In particular, Kenshirou is a convenience store worker, Raoh works at a factory, and wracked by illness, Toki is looking for work. The legend of the Fighting NEET (Not in Education, Employment, or Training) North Star begins in the modern day.

(Source: Crunchyroll)


Note: Short stories adapting Hokuto no Ken: Ichigo Aji manga are included at the end of each episode.

Serving as a spinoff gag manga of the original Hokuto no Ken series, the story is a parody of Fist of the North Star by Buronson and Tetsuo Hara. It consists of page-long gags centered mainly on Souther, both within his final battle with Kenshiro and inserting himself into other parts of the series where he doesn't belong. One recurring gag involves the kid with a turban repeatedly stabbing Souther in the leg every time he climbs the pyramid's staircase, and another involves Rei suddenly transforming into Souther in his iconic moments. 

(Source: Hokuto no Ken Wikia)

data.title: Norasco (TV)
data.title_japanese: 野良スコ
data.synopsis: musicる TV signed up Norasco for their channel. Some of the ONA's episodes were shown and then the episodes became mostly musicる TV exclusive.

titles.title: 野良スコ「シネマポイントカード」編

data.title: Norasco: Cinema Point Card-hen
data.title_japanese: 野良スコ「シネマポイントカード」編
data.synopsis: Norasco episodes made for and screened at 109 Cinemas during previews. The films were fully included intermittently on the 4-disc DVD release of Norasco. The first and sixth episode were also posted on the official youtube page at later dates.

titles.title: Nintama Rantarou: Dokutake Onsen no Dan
忍たま乱太郎 ドクタケ温泉の段

data.title: Nintama Rantarou: Dokutake Onsen no Dan
data.title_japanese: 忍たま乱太郎 ドクタケ温泉の段
data.synopsis: The Lord of Maitake Castle asks the Ninjutsu Academy Headmaster to accompany him when he sneaks out incognito to visit a dango shop, and Rantarou, Kirimaru and Shinbei tag along for the trip as well. However, it turns out that the shop is actually a Dokutake Castle trap, and they're not the only ones who have been caught.

titles.title: Nintama Rantarou: Ninjutsu Gakuen to Nazo no Onna - Kore wa Jiken da yo! no Dan
忍たま乱太郎 忍術学園と謎の女 これは事件だよ〜！の段

data.title: Nintama Rantarou: Ninjutsu Gakuen to Nazo no Onna - Kore wa Jiken da yo! no Dan
data.title_japanese: 忍たま乱太郎 忍術学園と謎の女 これは事件だよ〜！の段
data.synopsis: While Rantarou and Fushikizou are out running an errand, Fushikizou happens to spot a mysterious woman who's being chased by some of the Tasogaredoki Castle ninjas. It turns out the woman is actually the disguised leader of the Dokutake Castle ninjas, Hieta Happousai, and the entire Ninjutsu Academy ends up getting involved in the events.

data.title: Inferno Cop Specials
data.title_japanese: インフェルノコップ
data.synopsis: Three special episodes of Inferno Cop. The first features cameos of characters from Little Witch Academia. The third episode involves Inferno Cop traveling to New Jersey, where he comes across Donald Trump.
data.background: The short first short was aired at the 2015 AnimeNEXT and Anime Expo conventions. The second was screened at the 2016 AnimeNEXT convention. The third was screen at Anime Expo 2017.

titles.title: The Town Where Only I am Missing
ERASED - Die Stadt, in der es mich nicht gibt -

data.title: Boku dake ga Inai Machi
data.title_japanese: 僕だけがいない街
title_synonyms: The Town Where Only I am Missing
data.synopsis:
When tragedy is about to strike, Satoru Fujinuma finds himself sent back several minutes before the accident occurs. The detached, 29-year-old manga artist has taken advantage of this powerful yet mysterious phenomenon, which he calls "Revival," to save many lives.
 
However, when he is wrongfully accused of murdering someone close to him, Satoru is sent back to the past once again, but this time to 1988, 18 years in the past. Soon, he realizes that the murder may be connected to the abduction and killing of one of his classmates, the solitary and mysterious Kayo Hinazuki, that took place when he was a child. This is his chance to make things right.
 
Boku dake ga Inai Machi follows Satoru in his mission to uncover what truly transpired 18 years ago and prevent the death of his classmate while protecting those he cares about in the present.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: Boku dake ga Inai Machi is based on Kei Sanbe's manga series of the same title. The anime adapts the full story of the manga, though it condenses and alters the events that take place in volumes 6 to 8. The first two episodes were shown at an event on January 5, 2016, at Shinjuku Ward 9. A live-action movie adaptation was released in Japan on March 19, 2016 which also featured an alternate ending. A live-action Netflix TV series was released on December 15, 2017.

titles.title: かみさまみならい ヒミツのここたま

data.title: Kamisama Minarai: Himitsu no Cocotama
data.title_japanese: かみさまみならい ヒミツのここたま
data.synopsis:
Cocotama are tiny gods born from the thoughts and feelings of objects that people use with great care. The fact that Cocotama wear part of the egg they hatch out of as underwear is proof that they are still apprentices. The Cocotama use a mysterious magic, and they train hard to be of use to humans and to become full gods. They live inside human houses and stealthily move around to help humans find things they have lost, although they make many mistakes.

(Source: ANN)

data.title: Burenai Ai de
data.title_japanese: ぶれないアイで
data.synopsis:
Burenai Ai de was released on Miku's anniversary. The song is now used for the AR campaign for Rohto Pharmaceutical's new eye drops "Digi Eye". Like much of Mitchie's song titles this one has a double meaning, "ai" (love) and "eye" both being correct translations.

An app was released in August 2014 that would play a partial version of the song and show a 3D Miku dancing on any surface.

(Source: Vocaloid Wiki)

titles.title: ベイブレードバースト

data.title: Beyblade Burst
data.title_japanese: ベイブレードバースト
data.synopsis:
The story revolves around Valt Aoi and Shu Kurenai as well as their teammates, Rantaro Kiyama, Daina Kurogami and Wakiya Komurasaki at the Beigoma Academy school in Japan. When not studying, the close friends are obsessed with their Beyblade, creating a school bey club later in the season and challenging each other to battles at their Bey Stadium. The friends eventually become friendly rivals as they compete against each other in a competition to claim the title of Japan’s top Blader.

(Source: Beyblade Wiki)

titles.title: サイボーグ009VSデビルマン

data.title: Cyborg 009 VS Devilman
data.title_japanese: サイボーグ009VSデビルマン
data.synopsis:
After discovering the existence of demons in Tokyo, the original Cyborg crew led by Dr. Gilmore find themselves in conflict with Devilman, a strong demon believed to be in league with the war-profiteering terrorist organisation, Black Ghost. Meanwhile, a bigger threat emerges when Dr. Adams, a Black Ghost scientist unleashes his new line of high teen Cyborg models against 009 and his friends.

(Source: ANN)
data.background: Cyborg 009 VS Devilman is a crossover anime which was announced separately as new works of Cyborg 009 (in March 2015) and Devilman (in April 2015). The two were later revealed to be a single work. It was screened in theaters for a two-week period beginning October 17, 2015, before being released as OVAs. Ishimori Production co-sponsored the production as part of the 50th anniversary of the Cyborg 009 manga.

titles.title: Kuroko no Basket: Saikou no Present desu
黒子のバスケ〜最高のプレゼントです〜
Kuroko’s Basketball: It is the Best Present
Kuroko no Basket: Temporada 3. Episodio 26:El Mejor Regalo

data.title: Kuroko no Basket: Saikou no Present desu
data.title_english: Kuroko’s Basketball: It is the Best Present
data.title_japanese: 黒子のバスケ〜最高のプレゼントです〜
data.synopsis:
It is Tetsuya Kuroko's birthday. In celebration, Satsuki Momoi has invited the other members of the Generation of Miracles to play basketball together and rekindle the memories from their nostalgic middle school days. Meanwhile, Taiga Kagami and his fellow teammates of Seirin High are doing their best to prepare for Kuroko's birthday party.

Sometimes, the best gift one can receive is not a material one but, rather, the feeling of having fun with everyone!

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

titles.title: Saru Getchu Movie: Ougon no Pipo Helmet - Ukki Battle
劇場版 サルゲッチュ 黄金のピポヘル・ウッキーバトル

data.title: Saru Getchu Movie: Ougon no Pipo Helmet - Ukki Battle
data.title_japanese: 劇場版 サルゲッチュ 黄金のピポヘル・ウッキーバトル
data.synopsis: One day, a strange monkey with a golden helmet drains out the insides of another monkey by kissing him. Hikaru, Spike's brother,  goes out on an adventure to find this strange monkey. He soon befriends the monkeys and runs forward. But it isn't easy when every boss from the former games tries to block his path...
data.background: Saru Getchu Movie was screened alongside . The two movies were previewed during an event on August 11, 2002, before opening to the public on August 17.

titles.title: Ape Escape: Let Me Get You
レッチュ ゲッチュ サルゲッチュ

data.title: Letchu, Getchu, Saru Getchu
data.title_japanese: レッチュ ゲッチュ サルゲッチュ
title_synonyms: Ape Escape: Let Me Get You
data.synopsis: The monkeys are up to no good again, but this time they're on the "heroes" side. Performing no good magic shows, cloning themselves with a ninja Jutsu and filling UFO catchers with themselves are just a few of the tricks they're pulling, while at the same time trying to adapt themselves to the human lifestyle.
data.background: Letchu, Getchu, Saru Getchu was broadcast during the TV Tokyo program Oha Suta.
